references.paper_title: Playing Atari with deep reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper is foundational in the field of deep reinforcement learning, demonstrating the power of deep neural networks for mastering complex game environments.

references.paper_title: Human-level control through deep reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper achieved a significant milestone by demonstrating human-level performance in playing Atari games using deep reinforcement learning.

references.paper_title: Mastering the game of Go with deep neural networks and tree search
references.reason: This paper showcased the ability of deep reinforcement learning combined with Monte Carlo Tree Search to defeat a world champion at the game of Go.

references.paper_title: A general reinforcement learning algorithm that masters chess, shogi, and Go through self-play
references.reason: This paper introduced AlphaZero, a general reinforcement learning algorithm that achieved superhuman performance in chess, shogi, and Go through self-play.

references.paper_title: Continuous control with deep reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper addressed the challenge of continuous control tasks, paving the way for applying deep reinforcement learning to robotics and other continuous control domains.
